channel.title: Need A Walkthrough and a Coder
channel.description:
I need someone that can walk me and a buddy of mine into making a private server without access to my router, and not using hamachi.
Plus, when i get the server started, we will need a coder, the coder will get adminship in the server if they would like.
I have a separate computer that i used to run 6 Battle Field 2 servers on at once, so i can use it to keep the server up for 20+ hours a day
anyone that wishes to help with this future "epic" server, is welcome to...

item.title: Need A Walkthrough and a Coder
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

without access to your router, or hamachi… looks like you’re playing alone then. I’m not a genius at networking, but I believe you’ll need one or the other to allow people to connect, unless your router is default allow all connections on all ports.

Read full topic
item.source: Need A Walkthrough and a Coder
